programme.title: Space Dealers
programme.desc: Cole gets lucky when he finds a Russian space suit in an old box. But there’s a problem – the gloves are missing. To find the gloves he has to strike a deal with Larry which sees them take a trip through the desert. Meanwhile Torie hears how Coke and Pepsi joined the space race; and she meets former NASA astronaut Winston Scott who tells her about the struggles of keeping clean in zero-G. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Solar System: Secrets of the Universe
programme.desc: Join our host on the International Space Station of the year 2050. Marvel at the three-dimensional sights and learn many things about the astral bodies that surround us. Duration: 7200

programme.desc: The year is 1990. An alien species makes contact with Earth through radio transmission. An alien ship crash lands on Mars, and a rescue team is sent from Earth. Eventually a surviving female is located and brought on-board the Earth ship. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Dealers
programme.desc: It’s one of the biggest events in the space calendar – a gala dinner at Kennedy Space Center with Buzz Aldrin and Apollo 13’s Jim Lovell. But Larry, Cole and Torie don’t have tickets. So when one comes up for grabs they do what they do best – they face off in a space dealing competition: whoever makes the most money before the big night wins. Torie stakes her reputation on an Apollo 17 map used on the surface of the moon; Larry gets his hands on a one-of-a-kind Skylab prototype; and Cole acquires a mysterious homing beacon – could it be a relic from an Apollo mission? To make big money and win the ticket Cole has to turn detective. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Dominion
programme.desc: In five days the world changed. As a retired Intelligence agent turned UFO investigator races to discover the fate of the human race, an alien observer searches for the human woman he loves. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Tourist - Going to space!
programme.desc: Sabree Edwards hosts from the Columbia Memorial Space Center in Downey, California. He takes us for an inside look at Virgin Galactic's facilities in New Mexico as well as what you can expect if you ride on Blue Origin or want to watch a launch in Florida. Duration: 1800

programme.title: SC Movie: Invisible Invaders
programme.desc: Invisible aliens from the Moon invade the Earth by occupying the bodies of the recently deceased. A scientist, his daughter and an army Major, try to fight them. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: It Came From Outer Space
programme.desc: A spaceship from another world crashes in the rural Arizona desert. An amateur stargazer and a schoolteacher suspect alien influence when the local townsfolk begin to act strange. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Force of Impact
programme.desc: The sky is literally falling in this thriller as one of the nation's leading astronomers, Madison Kelsey believes she is tracking a huge rogue asteroid rocketing toward earth. Duration: 7200
